import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FaPhone, FaEnvelope, FaTachometerAlt, FaUsers, FaClipboardList, // Import icon for Attendance } from "react-icons/fa"; // Removed FaMapMarkerAlt const Sidebar = () => { return (
{/* Dashboard Link */} Dashboard {/* Employee List Link (Moved to 2nd position) */} Employee List {/* Call Log Link */} Call Log {/* Messages Link */} Messages {/* Location Link */} Location {/* Attendance Link (Newly Added) */} {/* New Attendance icon */} Attendance
); }; export default Sidebar;
